channel.title: Kissmy[550]b - Scapeemulator based server
channel.description:
[center]------------------------------ [size=1.45em]Kissmy550[/size] ------------------------------ [/center] [sub]A little bit about me first; I've been using Java for around 2 years and in the RSPS scene for about 3 years. I haven't really got much 'advanced' knowledge about RSPS but I can dabble my way through lol. I go to university and study Computer Science. I currently work as an IT Technician however have plans on trying to get into software engineering.[/sub]
Kissmy550b isn't the official name but this is my 550 server based [url=http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs-503-client-server/downloads/492138-scapeemulator.html]ScapeEmulator[/url] by [url=http://www.rune-server.org/members/jonneh/]Jonneh/[/url] and [url=http://www.rune-server.org/members/graham]Graham/[/url]. I've been working on this for a while now and thought it's finally time I posted a thread to showcase my current development. Being the only developer there isn't much too much to show however with minimum information on the 550 version available I think I've done a good job :) I've changed of what originally came with the server e.g. using [url=http://gradle.org/]Gradle[/url] instead of [url=https://maven.apache.org/]Maven[/url] and am handling a lot of the SQL stuff using [url=http://hibernate.org/]Hibernate[/url]. I'm also debating if I should change the networking to something more confortable (personal preference, nothing wrong with it currently).
[/sub][center]------------------------------ [b][size=1.35em]Features[/size][/b] ------------------------------
Almost Full player updating and some NPC updating Update server (ofc) Most packet sizes have been identified Game clicking (buttons, npcs, objects etc) Item on item, item on player, item on object Wearing items - Most items go in correct slots Almost all item, object and NPC examinations Item definitions such as prices, bonuses, alch values, item-tradable, item-members, weight and a few others Weapon speeds Walking, talking etc Almost a complete music system
Just for the banter, I pretty much have 100% herblore skill haha
Note: All data has been dumped from runescape.wiki.
------------------------------ [b][size=1.35em]Pictures![/size][/b] ------------------------------
[img]http://i.imgur.com/pmsUCBP.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/ZG6DOWJ.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/FS2TjzO.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/Aqn0PEF.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/8gGKX9Z.gif[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/QAG1plS.gif[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/TagDQZq.gif[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/yDWHzLL.gif[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/1BGLXdJ.png[/img] [img]https://i.imgur.com/LG9CLzi.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/FZwW3rb.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/vU95MCF.png[/img]
------------------------------ [b][size=1.35em]Other Information[/size][/b] ------------------------------
[/center]A few things tht I'm currently working on is trading and banking. I have also started on combat however all that will be done slowly. There's some important packets I need to identify before I can carry anything else. As a side note, if there are any packets for the 550 version anybody has, please tell me them! If anybody wants to help with development, I'd appriciate it alot :)
I know there a few 550's out there with perhaps more content however I don't even know what happened to those projects. I very much intend to finish this project. 550 is my favorite version and I really do want to host this. Persistance is the key ;)
Special thanks to [url=http://www.rune-server.org/members/luke132/]Luke132/[/url] and members in the shoutbox for helping me a lot by answering many of my annoying questions lol
Thanks

item.title: Kissmy[550]b - Scapeemulator based server
item.dc:creator: @my-swagger my-swagger
item.description:
@my-swagger wrote:

Thanks guys, working on this slow and steady by myself
If anybody has any 550 packets they might know about, please share?

As for development there is 1 very important packet I need to find! ScapeEmulator and Apollo may refer to it as ScriptIntMessage. I’ll eventually find it if nobody knows what it could be or wants to help me lol

Update:

LG9CLzi.png766×503

More updates:

Correct item bonuses and weight!

FZwW3rb.png765×503

Just a quick update:

Add a music system based on region ids. As of now I currently have 437 regions with near enough their correct music playing.
The song name shows in the music tab and you can unlock music by visiting their regions. I just need to figure out how to send the unlock status to the music interface.

vU95MCF.png764×503

Thanks to Leanbow/ for the packet id

Read full topic

item.title: Kissmy[550]b - Scapeemulator based server
item.dc:creator: @my-swagger my-swagger
item.description:
@my-swagger wrote:

Development is looking good but it’s really hard finding all the packets I need. The can be rocket science to look into! Thanks to Method for the refactored(ish) client, it’s going a little easier.

I’ve added full herblore and working on fletching now (2 easy skills lmao).
Found some problems with the initial data, item models not correct, not all object def is present blah blah, will work on that soon.

Thanks for the comments. I’ll post all the 550 data that I find when I’ve got enough to be of help. And sorry for the lame pictures.

Read full topic

item.title: Kissmy[550]b - Scapeemulator based server
item.dc:creator: @my-swagger my-swagger
item.description:
@my-swagger wrote:

[center]------------------------------
[size=1.45em]Kissmy550[/size]

[/center] [sub]A little bit about me first; I’ve been using Java for around 2 years and in the RSPS scene for about 3 years. I haven’t really got much ‘advanced’ knowledge about RSPS but I can dabble my way through lol. I go to university and study Computer Science. I currently work as an IT Technician however have plans on trying to get into software engineering.[/sub]

Kissmy550b isn’t the official name but this is my 550 server based ScapeEmulator by Jonneh/ and Graham/. I’ve been working on this for a while now and thought it’s finally time I posted a thread to showcase my current development. Being the only developer there isn’t much too much to show however with minimum information on the 550 version available I think I’ve done a good job I’ve changed of what originally came with the server e.g. using Gradle instead of Maven and am handling a lot of the SQL stuff using Hibernate. I’m also debating if I should change the networking to something more confortable (personal preference, nothing wrong with it currently).

[/sub][center]------------------------------
[size=1.35em]Features[/size]

Almost Full player updating and some NPC updating
Update server (ofc)
Most packet sizes have been identified
Game clicking (buttons, npcs, objects etc)
Item on item, item on player, item on object
Wearing items - Most items go in correct slots
Almost all item, object and NPC examinations
Item definitions such as prices, bonuses, alch values, item-tradable, item-members, weight and a few others
Weapon speeds
Walking, talking etc
Almost a complete music system

Just for the banter, I pretty much have 100% herblore skill haha

Note: All data has been dumped from runescape.wiki.

[/center]A few things tht I’m currently working on is trading and banking. I have also started on combat however all that will be done slowly. There’s some important packets I need to identify before I can carry anything else.
As a side note, if there are any packets for the 550 version anybody has, please tell me them! If anybody wants to help with development, I’d appriciate it alot

I know there a few 550’s out there with perhaps more content however I don’t even know what happened to those projects. I very much intend to finish this project. 550 is my favorite version and I really do want to host this.
Persistance is the key

Special thanks to Luke132/ and members in the shoutbox for helping me a lot by answering many of my annoying questions lol

Thanks
